om Norway. I've been lurking here a while 
and learnd alot. Thanks

I'm mos=
tly, or more or less exclusively, interested in japanese history from 
the =
14th to 16th century (I'm interesten in the history leading up to that 
too=
, but thats where most of my interest lie) I think the reason for this is 
=
that I'm studying Tenshin Shoden Katori Shinto Ryu (which stems from 1447),=
 
and I'm one of those who thinks the gun ruind the samurai (you all know 
=
those guys, don't you? ;) )

I'm trying to find info on the Onin war battle=
s... things like what kind of 
armor thay used (difference between upper cl=
ass, middle class and lower 
class armor), and the battle tactics of the da=
y (formations ect.) and so 
on... so do you guys know of any good books and=
/or web sites on this time 
span in japanese history which touch on some of=
 or all of these subjects I 
would verry much appreciate it. (I'm also iter=
ested in battle paintings or 
prints from this time frame)

thanks alot! an=
d thanks for a great mailing list.

Marius.
